snippet.title: 9  The Role of DevOps in Legacy System Modernization
snippet.description:
⚙️ The Role of DevOps in Legacy System Modernization  
🎥 Episode 9 of 10 — Just Dropped

Think DevOps is only for greenfield projects?  
🚫 Think again.

Legacy systems can be modernized—with the *right* DevOps strategy.

Too often, outdated environments are slow, fragile, and siloed.  
🧱 No automation  
⏳ Long deployment cycles  
💥 Frequent outages

But when CTOs bring DevOps into the picture, everything changes.

🎥 In this 2-minute episode, we explore:
🔍 Why DevOps is *not optional* for legacy modernization  
🔧 How CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, and test automation can breathe new life into old systems  
🚀 How NKD Agility brings DevOps into legacy environments—without business disruption

This is real transformation—not a band-aid.

💡 DevOps isn’t just a toolset. It’s a mindset—and it’s the bridge between legacy pain and engineering excellence.

If you’re a CTO leading modernization, DevOps is your secret weapon.

👇 Watch now. Follow us for the full 10-part series.  Visit https://nkdagility.com/capabilities/azure-devops-migration-services/ if you need help with #azuredevops or #devopsmigration

#CTO #DevOps #LegacySystems #EngineeringExcellence #CI/CD #InfrastructureAsCode #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #ModernizationMindset
